Articles.Content: No, I use both and it works just fine.
Me 2. What i found is that if ur ship exits kerbins soi and u go 2 space centre it make lazor unusable.I hope they fix zis soon.

Having your plugin installed breaks up mighty aircraft carriers, twisting them into wreckage upon load from a game save, as well as other wonkiness. Any way to make the environment loading less "violent"?

Basically, Lazor.dll does not play nice with deployed InfiniteDice's carriers. Any time you come within loading range (as set by the settings thingy) or upon load of any game save, the physics engine causes them to crack up on the surface or teleport straight to the ocean floor. Without Lazors installed, Squads physics loads don't sink ships.

Anyways, my dream of a fully functioning carrier, complete with missile-armed fighters, will need to wait.

I'm having a similar problem to everyone else, after moving ships to Mun orbit with Hyperedit all the lazor stuff stopped working, no visible beams, no activation sounds, nothing. You can access all the windows in the menu and such, but the sunbeams won't fire, missile tracking won't work, and no accessory lasers will work.
i to have many malfunctioning ships orbiting and landed on the mun. and all the ships back on kerbon still work fine.

Romfarer, do you keep your code in a public repo (eg, github)? I'd love to use the latest code if it includes a fix for the Kerbin SOI bug (even if the latest code isn't very well tested)!

Thanks much for all your awesome stuff in any case

I fixed the "outside Kerbin SOI" bug in the version i got on my computer. I guess i should upload it and call it the next version...

I haven't had much time to work on my mods lately for obvious reasons. My focus is almost 100% on KSP gui's atm.

Is there a Docking camera tutorial?

How do I interpret the values on the display?
i heard that Romfarer did first kerbal camera, but i cant seem to find anything mentioned about it there, could anyone point me to FPS cam part?
Thats the camera im using, but I have not been able to find any information about what the numbers mean so I know how to use it.

so I put the auto pilot tlaxor thing on but it seems to not work in the new version
So it's not my fault that the fuel transfer fails on Mun. Ok, I'll just wait for the fixed version. Thanks.
Is it possible to increase the draw distance via this mod? Id like to be able to see a ship go from the ground to the air without disappearing.

Is it possible to increase the draw distance via this mod? Id like to be able to see a ship go from the ground to the air without disappearing.

You can change it on the Space Center scene.

Hi Romfarer. I have just installed the mod recently, and it plays great! Except...

When I go to Space Center from Flight, I can't click anything except the Crew Manifest and MC mod and the back button (NOTE: the game did not freeze.). After clicking the back button, I still can't click on the buttons except Check for Update and Run Test Unit button. Didn't have this before I installed the plugin.

Hi everybody, noob here.

I registered to report the same problem you seem to call the kerbin SOI bug. I have a rover on the mun, with the cone module and a bunch of lasers. works fine on the launchpad, but as other reported, once switching to another spacecraft and comming back everything was broken.

By that i mean, my subsystems forlder is empty (see screenshot).

The gui is there no texture glitch, the mod works perfectly on the launchpad, so no install issues.

Romafrer, can you confirm this is the same bug and that your fix will... fix that?

Thanks for the great work anyway, i'm new to kerbal and have been addicted since i first tried it, partly thanks to the great community. keep up the good work.

Edited August 22, 2013 by Jul

I also just downloaded this mod, used it long enough to get to the mun, and came back the next day to discover the lazor system unusable. I registered on the forums just to plead for the release of the update.

Edited August 22, 2013 by Bill Brasky

Care to elaborate?

In the KSC scene you should see a lazor button on the top left of the screen, it has several options including draw distance.
